name: T_set_min
description: Required minimum indoor temperature (for heating load calculation)

name: T_set_max
description: Required maximum indoor temperature (for cooling load calculation)

name: T_bivalent
description: Dual mode temperature (for heat pump design)

name: buildings_short
description: Abbreviations of the selectable building types.

name: buildings_long
description: Names of the four selectable building types.

name: retrofit_short
description: Abbreviations of the retrofit levels of the reseidential buildings.

name: retrofit_long
description: Names of the retrofit levels of the reseidential buildings.

name: dhwload
description: Maximal power for domestic hot water for each building type (SFH, MFH, TH, AB, OB, School).

name: mean_drawoff_vol_per_day
description: Mean drawoff DHW volume per day and person for each building type (SFH, MFH, TH, AB, OB, School). Source: 12831-3/A100 Table NA.4

name: ratio_area
description: Ratio of net floor area to total gross floor area for each of the five building types (SFH, MFH, TH and AB)
